track.name: Pressure Drop
comments: No 1 inna ska reagge style.... ska ska ska
Been humming this at work all day :D
Good music to run over cops in San Andreas :D
I've found myself hummin this about half a dozen times in the last week and here I am, sittin in the sunshine with a freshly built spliff and what does lastfm throw out of my library? serendipity
Great song, also included in a great soundtrack of a great game - GTA: San Andreas. Lovely tune for riding a lowrider. ;)

love this song. My favourite of the Maytals. This means alot 2mean; when eva I hear it reminds me of time when my girlfriend left me and evrything went wrong!!! Sik 2sing along to n cheer me up!!!!
One of my faves.  I love the Clash's cover too.
